content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  July 14 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Enstar Group Limited's (Enstar) Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB'  senior unsecured notes at 'BBB-' and senior shelf registration at 'BBB-'. The Rating Outlook is Stable.
